Text: Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva s th anniversaryDear Sirs In the next few days you will be receiving an envelope from Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados containing a CDRom prepared on occasion of the firms th anniversary We are sending you this message due to the threat of Anthrax in correspondences received by mail and consequent fear spread throughout the world Please do not hesitate to contact us should you need further information or any clarification Yours very truly Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados Sao Paulo Brazil
